long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vectorial AI's UI Design Companion intelligently analyzes your design and gives you suggestions on your UI design, it also integrates with you favorite ticketing systems like Jira to send design recommendations directly to your own Jira Board.
